    - [ ]  (w2, maybe) Implement victory points: Give each player a certain amount of “victory points” at the beginning of the game. Victory points are also available in the market, but each time a player buys victory points, the other player with the least (or the most maybe?) amount of victory points will deduct the same amount as the player buys. Each time a player kills another player, the victory points of the player being killed will be transferred to the player killing it. Finally, if one player holds all the victory points, the player wins.
        
        [data:image/png;base64,](data:image/png;base64,)
